titleInfo.title: Battles of Chattanooga, Lookout Mountain and Misson Ridge

subject.topic: United States Civil War 1861-1865 -- Songs and music.
Debate over slavery, the Secession Crisis, and the Civil War: Tennessee as a uniquely divided border state .

mods.note: This composition's full title includes the dates of the battles as November 23d, 24th and 25, 1863 and is "Respectfully dedicated to the Commands of the Keystone State who participated in the Battle: Geary, Murphy, Bushback and McAloon. The back cover has a long poem titled "Chattanooga, Lookout Mountain and Misson Ridge" written by Miss Mary F. Cullen describing the battles and ending with expressions of hope for the future.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices
